issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When I try to launch my app (or a brand new test app) using the iOS simulator, Studio launches the simulator, but never installs the app.  No error message.  The last 3 lines in the console are:

[INFO] :   Invoking xcodebuild
[INFO] :   Finished building the application in 29s 410ms
[INFO] :   Launching iOS Simulator

The simulator is launched, but no app.
fields.summary: Studio will not install app on iOS simulator
fields.environment:
Studio 4.8.1 (Affected versions above doesn't have 4.8.1)
SDK 6.0.1
XCode 8.2.1
Mac OS X Sierra

comments.body: Please cancel this ticket. I mistakenly didnt update my tiapp.xml after updating to 6.0.1.  After doing so, the simulator works as expected.
